title: Deep Learning for Multiclass Classification
description: Discuss how deep learning architectures are adapted for multiclass problems.

examples.description: Utilizes a neural network ensemble (SE-SDAE) to identify different levels of cognitive load from EEG signals.
Proposes a Deep Spatio-Temporal Convolutional Bidirectional LSTM Network (DSTCLN) for classifying multiple mental states, including five levels of drowsiness.
Classifies alertness and drowsy states with a multi-layer perceptron (MLP) neural network, suggesting potential for detecting varying levels of drowsiness.

why_introduced: To leverage the feature learning capabilities of deep learning for complex multiclass classification tasks.
